messages.message: Hello. Can we allow the Advanced Model in a Derived Field? We're working on Apps to analyze complex legal documents. One field will depend on one or more previous fields, according to some business rules that can be complicated, like deciding what company or department or a group may be involved in a legal case, based on information from previous fields. Is there a technical limitation to allow the Advanced Model in a derived field? Thanks.

there is a related thread from a month ago with the EPD ticket following up on this: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0516UPPMT3/p1747140902559239
@Kaustubh (KD) owns this :wink:
cc:@Serena main reason i asked if this was a low hanging fruit
following up on the ticket itself
